identificationModule.briefTitle: A Urine Sample Collection Study in Apparently Healthy Adults and Adults With Chronic, Stable Morbidities
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Urine Sample Collection Study in Apparently Healthy Adults and Adults With Chronic, Stable Morbidities

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The objective of this study is collect urine samples from healthy adult subjects and subjects with stable chronic morbidities for future testing to serve as controls and establish reference ranges in the development of new invitro diagnostic devices.

armGroups.label: Cohort A
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Urine collection for NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test

armGroups.label: Cohort B
interventionNames: Diagnostic Test: Urine collection for NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test

interventions.name: Urine collection for NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test
interventions.description: Urine will be collected and banked for future analysis with the NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test

primaryOutcomes.measure: Reference interval as defined by Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute guideline EP28 for urinary C-C motif chemokine 14 concentration measured with the NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test within each cohort
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Determined for urine sample collected at baseline

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Apparently Healthy Adults and Adults With Chronic, Stable Morbidities
